item.title: 人头马君度酒第一季度销售额降幅超出预期，美国困境仍在继续
item.description: 人头马君度（Remy Cointreau）周三报告称，第一季度销售额下降 15.6%，降幅超出预期，原因是其美国干邑部门所面临的困难波及到了利口酒和烈酒部门。【原文：Remy Cointreau reported a wider-than-expected 15.6% decline in first-quarter sales on Wednesday, as difficulties hurting its U.S. cognac division spread to its liqueurs and spirits unit.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行交易收入大增，业绩超出预期
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）周三公布的季度收益好于预期，得益于股票交易的激增，投资银行业务收入大幅增长，抵消了法国零售业务净利息收入的急剧下降。【原文：France's BNP Paribas posted better-than-expected quarterly earnings on Wednesday after investment banking revenue jumped thanks to a surge in equities trading, offsetting a sharp drop in net interest income in its French retail business.】

item.title: 德意志银行因巨额诉讼拨备而结束连年盈利
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周三披露，该行第二季度出现亏损，这是德意志银行四年来首次出现亏损，此前德意志银行为投资者因收购邮政银行而引发的旷日持久的诉讼拨备了 13 亿欧元（14.1 亿美元）。【原文：Deutsche Bank posted a loss in the second quarter, it disclosed on Wednesday, its first in four years after setting aside 1.3 billion euros ($1.41 billion) as a provision for a protracted investor lawsuit over its Postbank acquisition.】

item.title: 独家报道：LG Energy Solution 与中国企业洽谈为欧洲生产低成本电动汽车电池事宜
item.description: 韩国LG能源解决方案公司（LGES）的一位高级管理人员表示，该公司正在与三家中国供应商谈判，为欧洲生产低成本电动汽车电池。【原文：South Korea's LG Energy Solution (LGES) is in talks with about three Chinese suppliers to produce low-cost electric vehicle batteries for Europe, a senior executive said, with competition set to intensify after the EU slapped extra tariffs on China-built EVs.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，利洁时被股东逼迫重新考虑营养品业务的出售事宜
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，在美赞臣营养品业务遭遇诉讼和其他挫折后，英国消费品公司利洁时正面临来自大股东的压力，要求其重新考虑出售美赞臣营养品业务。【原文：British consumer goods company Reckitt is under pressure from top shareholders to revisit a sale of its Mead Johnson Nutrition business, following litigation and other setbacks at the division, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价乏善可陈的收益令投资者惶恐不安
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 法官称 Rivian 将在特斯拉商业机密盗窃案中出庭受审
item.description: 根据加利福尼亚州一名法官做出的初步裁决，电动汽车制造商 Rivian Automotive 将因被指控鼓励从埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司叛逃的员工窃取商业机密而受审。【原文：Electric car maker Rivian Automotive will go on trial over allegations that it encouraged its employees who defected from Elon Musk's Tesla to steal trade secrets, according to a tentative ruling issued by a California judge.】

item.title: 中国量化基金在打压中遭受严重损失
item.description: 数据显示，中国计算机驱动的 "量化 "对冲基金今年上半年损失惨重，表现逊于国内传统股票策略和其他流行的全球基金策略。【原文：Chinese computer-driven "quant" hedge funds suffered heavy losses in the first half of the year, underperforming traditional stocks strategies at home and other popular global fund strategies, data shows.】

item.title: 美国科技股收益令人失望，亚洲股市震荡；日元坚挺
item.description: 美国科技巨头特斯拉（Tesla）和 Alphabet 的财报乏善可陈，打压了市场情绪，周三亚洲股市低迷，而日元在下周央行会议前创下六周新高，会议仍将讨论加息问题。【原文：Asian stocks were subdued on Wednesday after lacklustre earnings from U.S. tech behemoths Tesla and Alphabet dented sentiment, while the yen hit a six-week high ahead of a central bank meeting next week where a rate hike remains on the table.】

item.title: 美国原油和燃料库存减少，油价上涨
item.description: 美国原油库存的下降导致油价在连跌数日后于周三反弹，而对中东即将达成停火协议的预期则阻止了油价继续攀升。【原文：Falling U.S. crude inventories caused oil prices to rebound on Wednesday after several days of decline, while expectations for a nearing ceasefire deal in the Middle East kept prices from continuing to climb.】

item.title: 马斯克发起投票，询问特斯拉是否应向 xAI 投资 50 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克周二在社交媒体 X 上发起了一项投票，询问特斯拉是否应该向 xAI 投资 50 亿美元。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk on Tuesday launched a poll on social media X asking whether Tesla should invest $5 billion in xAI.】

item.title: 大宗商品下滑，利差平仓，美元走强
item.description: 由于中国需求疲软，商品货币周三触及数周低点，而日元则因空头在央行会议前抛售而大涨。【原文：Commodity currencies touched multi-week lows on Wednesday tracking weakness in Chinese demand, while the yen has surged as short-sellers bail out ahead of a central bank meeting.】

item.title: 马斯克说，特朗普反对支持电动汽车的任何举动都会对竞争对手造成比特斯拉更大的伤害
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二表示，美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普可能取消对电动汽车的支持，这对其他汽车制造商的伤害将超过这家总部位于得克萨斯州奥斯汀的公司。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Tuesday that U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump's potential removal of support for electric vehicles would hurt other automakers more than the Austin, Texas-based firm.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称英伟达批准三星 HBM3 芯片用于中国市场处理器
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，三星电子的第四代高带宽内存（HBM3）芯片已首次获得英伟达（Nvidia）批准，可用于其处理器。【原文：Samsung Electronics' fourth-generation high bandwidth memory or HBM3 chips have been cleared by Nvidia for use in its processors for the first time, three people briefed on the matter said.】

item.title: 新日铁将在 20 年后解散与中国宝山的合资企业
item.description: 新日本制铁公司周二表示，将解散与中国宝山钢铁公司的合资企业，在双方现有股东协议于 8 月底到期后，结束长达 20 年的合作。【原文：Nippon Steel will dissolve its joint venture with China's Baoshan Iron & Steel , it said on Tuesday, ending two decades of cooperation when their existing shareholders' agreement expires at the end of August.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，KKR 支持的 OneStream 美国 IPO 定价高于区间，将融资 4.9 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，由私募股权公司 KKR 支持的金融软件制造商 OneStream 周二在美国的首次公开募股（IPO）定价高于预期范围，共募集资金 4.9 亿美元。【原文：Financial software maker OneStream , which is backed by private equity firm KKR , priced its U.S. initial public offering (IPO) above its indicated range on Tuesday, raising $490 million, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 波音恢复向中国交付 737 MAX 飞机
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，在因监管问题而长期推迟向中国交付其最畅销的 737 MAX 飞机之后，该公司已恢复向中国交付飞机。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it has resumed deliveries of its best-selling 737 MAX airplane to China after a lengthy delay stemming from regulatory issues.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司上调未来二十年全球运输量增长预期
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二表示，该公司预计未来20年全球客运量的增长速度将快于此前的预测，但认为支线飞机的交付空间较小。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer expects global passenger traffic in the next 20 years to grow at a faster pace than it had previously forecast but sees less room for regional aircraft deliveries, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标大型科技公司成为焦点，哈里斯在民调中抵消了特朗普的领先优势
item.description: 亚洲市场未来一天展望 作者：Alden Bentley【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets by Alden Bentley】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛任命 Akhil Shrivastava 为首席财务官
item.description: 雅诗兰黛周二表示，内部人士阿基尔-什里瓦斯塔瓦（Akhil Shrivastava）将接替特蕾西-特拉维斯（Tracey Travis），担任这家 MAC 口红生产商的财务总监。【原文：Estee Lauder said on Tuesday insider Akhil Shrivastava will succeed Tracey Travis as the MAC lipstick maker's finance chief, following her decision to retire after 12 years in the role.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，黑客泄露了五角大楼 IT 服务提供商 Leidos 的文件
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二援引一位知情人士的话报道称，黑客泄露了从美国政府最大的 IT 服务提供商之一 Leidos Holdings Inc 公司窃取的内部文件。【原文：Hackers have leaked internal documents stolen from Leidos Holdings Inc , one of the largest IT services providers to the U.S. government, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 调任人工智能安全负责人马德里
item.description: 据 The Information 周二报道，OpenAI 已将其人工智能（AI）安全负责人亚历山大-马德里（Aleksander Madry）调任 "研究机构内更重要的职位"。【原文：OpenAI has reassigned its artificial intelligence (AI) safety leader Aleksander Madry to a "bigger role within the research organization", The Information reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 净扣款上升，Capital One 利润下降 61
item.description: Capital One Financial 周二报告称，由于核销了部分贷款损失，该公司第二季度利润下降了 61%。【原文：Capital One Financial's profit fell 61% in the second quarter, it reported on Tuesday, as it wrote off losses on some loans.】

item.title: 消费支出强劲，维萨卡季度利润跃升 20
item.description: 本周二，Visa 公布第三季度利润增长 20%，这主要得益于消费者在外出就餐和旅游方面的强劲消费，尽管借贷成本仍然居高不下。【原文：Visa reported a rise of 20% in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by strong consumer spending on dining out and travel even as borrowing costs remain elevated.】

item.title: 模拟芯片制造商德州仪器第二季度利润超预期
item.description: 德州仪器公司周二公布的第二季度利润超过了分析师的预期，原因是个人电子产品等市场对模拟芯片的需求在经历了因大流行病期间的囤积而导致的长达数年的过剩之后趋于稳定。【原文：Texas Instruments beat analysts' estimates for second-quarter profit on Tuesday, as demand for analog chips from markets such as personal electronics stabilized after a years-long glut fueled by stockpiling during the pandemic.】

item.title: 玩具制造商美泰因成本控制而实现超预期季度利润
item.description: 周二，美泰第二季度利润超出华尔街预期，得益于玩具制造商严格的成本控制，美泰股价在盘后交易中上涨 2.1%。【原文：Mattel beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Tuesday, aided by the toymaker's tight cost controls, sending its shares up 2.1% in extended trading.】

item.title: 特斯拉利润率下降，原因是降价和激励措施造成的影响
item.description: 特斯拉（Tesla）周二表示，第二季度利润率下滑，原因是降价和刺激需求下滑的激励措施继续损害底线，同时该公司正在加大自动驾驶技术的力度。【原文：Tesla 's second-quarter margin dipped as price cuts and incentives to spur sagging demand continued to hurt the bottom line while the company intensifies its self-driving technology efforts, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 季度营收超预期
item.description: 受数字广告销售增长和云计算服务健康需求的推动，Alphabet 周二公布的第二季度营收超出预期。【原文：Alphabet beat second-quarter revenue estimates on Tuesday, driven by a rise in digital advertising sales and healthy demand for its cloud computing services.】

item.title: ELFA 称，6 月份美国商业设备借款下降 4
item.description: 美国设备租赁与融资协会（ELFA）周二称，6月份美国公司的设备投资融资借款比去年同期减少了4%。【原文：U.S. companies borrowed 4% less to finance equipment investments in June than a year ago, industry body Equipment Leasing and Finance Association (ELFA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：代理权争夺战失利后，迪士尼股东珀尔马特出售股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，华特迪士尼最大的投资者之一艾萨克-珀尔马特（Isaac Perlmutter）在代理权争夺战中败北后，已出售了他在这家媒体公司的全部股份。【原文：Isaac Perlmutter, one of the largest investors in Walt Disney , has sold his entire stake in the media company after losing the proxy fight, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】
